trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> events related to cell and row operations.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>与单元格和行的操作相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCellEventArgs class provides data for the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEnter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellLeave> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowEnter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowLeave> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>
trans-unit.target: The DataGridViewCellEventArgs class provides data for the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEnter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellLeave> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowEnter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowLeave> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowLeave></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowEnter></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleChanged></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellLeave></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEnter></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> class.
The index of the column containing the cell that the event occurs for.
trans-unit.target: 包含发生此事件的单元格的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell that the event occurs for.
trans-unit.target: 包含发生此事件的单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the column index of the cell that the event occurs for.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示发生此事件的单元格的列索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell that the event occurs for.
trans-unit.target: 包含发生此事件的单元格的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the row index of the cell that the event occurs for.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示发生此事件的单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell that the event occurs for.
trans-unit.target: 包含发生此事件的单元格的行索引。
